text: is a former Japanese football player. She played for the Japan national team. ==Biography== Jashima was born on December 26, 1959. On September 6, 1981, she debuted for the Japan national team against England. ==Statistics== Japan Football Association Japan national team Year Apps Goals 1981 1 0 Total 1 0 ==References== Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese footballers Category:Japan women's international footballers Category:Tasaki Perule FC players
title: Nobuko Jashima
